title: KUMAR PROPERTIES PRAKRUTI
detail: Kumar Properties Prakruti offers a serene blend of modern design and natural tranquility in a prime location. These well-appointed 2 BHK homes are designed to maximize comfort and functionality. Enjoy high-quality features such as contemporary modular kitchens, efficient climate control systems, and elegant glass partitions. With spacious private balconies, lush green surroundings, and exclusive amenities including a community garden and recreational areas, Kumar Properties Prakruti provides a harmonious living environment where every detail is tailored to enhance your lifestyle.
developer_detail:
Well-established name in Pune's real estate since 1966, Kumar Properties is a major player known for successful residential and commercial ventures, notably IT parks. Their extensive experience contributes to annual sales exceeding 1 million. Flagship projects like Pricetown Towers and Park Infinia showcase their expertise.

ABIL Group, an affiliate of Kumar Properties, strategically expands into residential, corporate, and hospitality sectors, with notable projects like Avaanti Residences and Castel Royal Grande.
city_description: Bhugaon is one of the most promising suburbs of Pune, teeming with upcoming residential projects. With seamless connectivity to all major highways as well as the city area, you get to live connected to the city while enjoying a peaceful retreat away from it.
